abstract: The chief executive at Berkshire Hathaway took home the same $100,000 in 2006 that he has been earning for 25 years.
snippet: The chief executive at Berkshire Hathaway took home the same $100,000 in 2006 that he has been earning for 25 years.
lead_paragraph: While many companies are starting tie the pay of chief executives to stock performance, don’t expect Berkshire Hathaway to jump on the bandwagon anytime soon.

headline.main: No Raise, but No Tears, for Warren Buffett
